title: Fairly heavy showers expected in some places today
byline: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Southern province today (09).

title: Indonesia ready to shelter Palestinians impacted by war in Gaza
byline: Indonesia is ready to temporarily shelter Palestinians impacted by the war in Gaza, President Prabowo Subianto said in a statement on Wednesday, as he started his trip to the Middle East region and Turkey.

title: Stocks slide again as US forges ahead with 104% tariffs on China
byline: The United States said on Tuesday that 104% duties on imports from China will take effect shortly after midnight, even as the administration of President Donald Trump moved to quickly start talks with other trading partners targeted by sweeping tariffs.

title: Urban schools face severe A/L teacher shortage?
byline: The Ceylon Teachers’ Union (CTU) raised alarm over a critical shortage of teachers for the G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) in schools across the country, particularly in urban national schools.

title: Roof collapses at a Dominican Republic nightclub, killing at least 79 people
byline: The roof of an iconic nightclub in the Dominican capital collapsed early Tuesday during a merengue concert attended by politicians, athletes and others, leaving at least 79 people dead and 160 injured, authorities said.

title: Major currencies strengthen against US Dollar despite tariff hikes, says Fitch
byline: Despite a significant rise in US tariffs, most major global currencies have appreciated against the US dollar since the start of the year, according to Fitch Ratings’ latest FX Market Monitor.

title: Tense standoff at Weligama apparel factory over unpaid New Year bonus
byline: A tense situation was reported at a privately-owned apparel factory in Udukawa, Weligama last night (April 8), after employees staged a protest against the management’s decision to withhold the Sinhala and Tamil New Year bonus.

title: Keheliya arrives at CID
byline: Former Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella has arrived at the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) to record a statement.

title: Over 304kg of Kerala cannabis seized in Kilinochchi
byline: An individual has been arrested for the possession of over 304kg of Kerala cannabis valued at Rs. 121 million in Kilinochchi.
